admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The project includes: (a) expansion of
            transmission system in Luzon comprising; (i) about 1,360 km
            of 230 kV, 115 kV and 69 kV transmission lines; (ii)
            substations with a total capacity of 225 MVA; (b) the first
            stage of establishing communication systems and a control
            center in Luzon; (c) support for NPC's training
            activities; (d) consultants' services for management
            improvement and a tariff study.
